name: ContraCube
description:
ContraCube was created in a week for the Brackeys 2022 Game Jam.

The theme is "It is NOT real". 

It's time to take control of the ContraCube! You must avoid all flashing obstacles while your ContraCube changes shape and add's to your score multiplier. Each level gets progressively harder to get to the end. 

Is the ContraCube a cube? A Ball? The source of Ultimate Power?  Yes. No. Maybe....

Assets/Resources used from Unity Asset Store:

  • Dustyroom Casual Game Sound - One Shot SFX Pack 
  • Cartoon FX Free, version 1.01 - Jean Moreno
  • TZ_Futuristic Panel Textures 
  • SkySeries Freebie Skybox
  • Free Stylized Textures
